code: import React from"react";import{Link,withRouter}from"react-router-dom";import{Layout,Menu}from"antd";import{HomeOutlined,UserOutlined,MenuOutlined,BookOutlined,MessageFilled}from"@ant-design/icons";import"./MenuSider.scss";function MenuSider(props){var menuCollapsed=props.menuCollapsed,location=props.location;var Sider=Layout.Sider;return/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(Sider,{className:"admin-sider",collapsed:menuCollapsed},/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(Menu,{theme:"dark",mode:"inline",defaultSelectedKeys:[location.pathname]},/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(Menu.Item,{key:"/admin",title:"Volver a la pagina principal"},/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(Link,{to:"/admin"},/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(HomeOutlined,null),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("span",{className:"nav-text"},"Home"))),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(Menu.Item,{key:"/admin/users",title:"Menu Usuarios"},/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(Link,{to:"/admin/users"},/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(UserOutlined,null),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("span",{className:"nav-text"},"Usuarios"))),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(Menu.Item,{key:"/admin/menu",title:"Menu Web"},/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(Link,{to:"/admin/menu"},/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(MenuOutlined,null),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("span",{className:"nav-text"},"Menu"))),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(Menu.Item,{key:"/admin/courses",title:"Menu Cursos"},/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(Link,{to:"/admin/courses"}),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(BookOutlined,null),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("span",{className:"nav-text"},"Cursos")),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(Menu.Item,{key:"/admin/blog",title:"Menu Post"},/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(Link,{to:"/admin/blog"}),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(MessageFilled,null),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("span",{className:"nav-text"},"Blog"))));}export default withRouter(MenuSider);

sourcesContent: import React from "react"; import { Link, withRouter } from "react-router-dom"; import { Layout, Menu } from "antd"; import { HomeOutlined, UserOutlined,MenuOutlined,BookOutlined,MessageFilled} from "@ant-design/icons"; import "./MenuSider.scss"; function MenuSider(props) { const { menuCollapsed, location } = props; const { Sider } = Layout; return ( Home Usuarios Menu Cursos Blog ); } export default withRouter(MenuSider);
